name: [ENG] 2ha Gaccha
description:
• FOREWORD:

Happy birthday, Wanning~ I made, or more accurately, completed  a game to celebrate this occasion.

Although I've built the base of this game quite a while ago, the total time I work on this project is still less than 3 days so EXPECT lots of wonkiness. It's not as well done as my previous games.

Anyway, don't be so scared and come play hahahahaha

  • SYNOPSIS:  

No plot, it's just a collection game. Pretty no brainer.

  • WARNING (PLEASE READ CAREFULLY BEFORE DOWNLOADING)
  1.  This is a fan game of the novel "The husky and his white cat shizun" by Meatbun doesn't eat meat. 
  2. This game is free, ad less, and doesn't bring back any commercial benefit to the game designer. 
  3. THERE'S NO SPOILER.  And whoooo SFW
  4. This game does not hold together too well so please be kind and don't click too fast while you're rolling. You may lose hearts for nothing.
  5. There will  be No IOS or web version
  6. Come talk to me if the gaccha rate hurts you. I may lower it
  7. CREDIT

1. MUSIC: 棠前春晓

2. Source codes for the minigames: 7dots

3. Where I created the chibi (Yeah I didn't draw them this time. Did some light edit tho): CHARAT CHOCO

Please drop a comments here or over at twitter (@tokihey) to motivate me hahaha

If you like this game, check out my other games at this page

There're  2 other 2ha games I've made, check my gallery out
